name: Harvest Survivor
description:
“Harvest Survivor” is an action game where you play an outworlder who has landed on a foreign planet and must survive by harvesting the planet’s fields.

However, the planet is inhabited by mad vegetables that will attack you as you try to gather resources.

You will need to strategize and use your resources wisely to defend yourself against the mad vegetables and continue your quest for survival.

You start the game with four weapons at your disposal:

  • A directional gun that fires in the direction you are moving.
  • A homing missile rocket launcher that targets the closest enemy.
  • A melee attack that always attacks left or right depending on the direction you are facing
  • A spell that fires magic around you to kill your enemies.

As you progress through the game, you will gain levels and be able to choose from a random list of perks to further strengthen your abilities.

Controls
  • Character Movement : WASD/Arrows (Keyboard) - Left stick (Gamepad)

Team
  • François Mauge
  • Vincent Schneider
  • Quentin Chevalier
  • Vincent Christiaens
